about_the_game:
Hot Pickle! Is a 2D platform jumping game for PC, Mac and Linux. Stephen J. Pickle has just been released from “The Big Pickle” to find his home village in Pickle Country recently raided and his friends, the Lil’ Gherkins, missing. With the advice of Ol’ Crusty P., the village sage, Stephen sets out an adventure through space and thyme to rescue his friends from the evil Burger Boss before they get eaten.

Features:
- Run, jump, shoot, and dash your way through 10 epic food-themed levels
- Battle giant tomatoes and screaming fish
- 12 original songs including the hit single “I Am Just a Pickle” by Chris Alarie
- Progress through 4 story-driven cutscenes
- Spine-tingling special effects!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
